course_name: Professional Practice Project in Mental Health Nursing
description: This course will provide students with the knowledge and skills to undertake a project within the MHN setting. Students will identify an issue related to the demands of expanded clinical practice in a MHN setting and critically address this through a review of the literature. In addition, students will have the opportunity to design and complete a project specific to their MHN practice. The outcomes of the project will be presented in a project report targetting key stakeholders in the student's MHN field of practice.
